title: Xi Yangyang Yu Hui Tailang: Tu Nian Ding Gua Gua
synopsis: The spring festival is around corner, but Mr. wolf doesn't feel happy at all. Mrs. Wolf is going to have baby, but Mr. Wolf can't catch any sheep. What is more, their castle is torn down making them homeless. Mr. Wolf needs to fight back.
related_anime: ['Xi Yangyang Yu Hui Tailang: Kaixin Chuang Long Nian', 'Xi Yangyang Yu Hui Tailang: Hu Hu Sheng Wei']
